I'm looking for a new place to live that is close to my favorite fishing spot.
my favorite book is ender s game.
i wear a lot of purple.

My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.
I have a lot of fond memories of playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
i am a full time mom.
i have been married eight years.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey there, how are you today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! Just got back from a hike, really enjoyed it.
That sounds fun, I miss hiking. I used to do it a lot when I was younger.
What happened?
I just got too busy with work and other stuff, but I'm hoping to start doing it again soon.
That's good to hear! What's your favorite thing to do while hiking?
I love taking in the scenery and looking for wildlife.
Me too! I once saw a bear while hiking. It was amazing.
Wow! That's really lucky. I've never seen a bear in the wild.
Yeah, it was pretty cool.
So, where do you like to go hiking?
I like to go hiking in the mountains. There are a lot of great trails around here.
That sounds nice. I'm not sure if we have any mountains around here.
Oh, where do you live?
I live in a small town in the Midwest.
Oh, I've never been to the Midwest.
It's pretty nice here. There's a lot of open space and not too many people.
That sounds like a nice place to live.
Yeah, it is
